comment: A subset of a metric space is closed iff every convergent sequence on it converges to a point in the subset. Theorem 1.4-6(b) of [Kreyszig] p. 30. (Contributed by NM, 11-Nov-2007.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 1-May-2014.)
